```{r}
dimensions <- function(x) {
  var_name <- deparse(substitute(x))
  rows <- nrow(x)
  columns <- ncol(x)
  
  message <- paste("The data set",  var_name, "has", rows, "rows and", columns, "columns.")
  print(message)
}

dimensions(rep1)
dimensions(rep2)
dimensions(rep3)
dimensions(rep4)
```
